ComicInfo.Summary:
Are You My Mummy?: Bruce and Rick return to earth only to find that the Living Pharaoh has turned all of the heroes of New York into mummies. The Pharaoh uses all of the mummy energies he has absorbed to turn himself into the gargantuan Living Monolith and the Hulk has to commandeer the Mummy Surfer's board (with Mummy Surfer still attached) to give the Monolith a bad case of cosmic indigestion.
Hulk Art Class: Three Hulks paint.
ComicInfo.Title: Are You My Mummy?; Hulk Art Class
